summary: Growth encompasses a journey of aligning personal strengths and addressing weaknesses. It involves strategic planning, building confidence, conducting SWOT analyses, and networking for resource acquisition. This tag primarily points to a course focused on these areas, aiming to guide individuals and startups toward effective self-improvement and strategic positioning.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
